title: HeightMapParameters
Grid resolution XY: Resolution of the height map grid
Grid size XY: Length of the side of the square height map grid
Max Z: Max z relative to robot mid foot z. Points above this threshold are ignored.
Nominal standard deviation: When calibrated on flat ground, this is the average standard deviation observed for a grid cell.
Mahalanobis scale: If a grid cell is at height h, points below (h - s * m) are ignored, and points above (h + s * m) will cause the cell to throw out old data and reset. where s is getNominalStandardDeviation() and m is this value.
Variance added when translating: This is the variance added to all past measurements when a cell is translated
Sensor variance when standing: This is the measurement variance when the robot is standing
Sensor variance when moving: This is the measurement variance when the robot is moving
